results.title: [Effect of various beta-adrenolytic drugs and calcium channel blocker (nifedipine) on selected indicators of calcium-phosphorus metabolism in patients with hyperthyroidism and simple goiter].
results.text_hl: The study was aimed at evaluation of the effect of short-term treatment with one of the six beta adrenolytic drugs (@CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@propranolol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Metoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008790 @@@metoprolol@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Pindolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D010869 @@@pindolol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Nadolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009248 @@@nadolol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Acebutolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000070 @@@acebutolol@@@) and @CHEMICAL_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002118 @@@calcium@@@ antagonist @CHEMICAL_Nifedipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009543 @@@nifedipine@@@ on the values of several parameters of @CHEMICAL_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002118 @@@calcium@@@-@CHEMICAL_Phosphorus @CHEMICAL_MESH:D010758 @@@phosphorus@@@ metabolism in 81 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Hyperthyroidism @DISEASE_MESH:D006980 @@@hyperthyroidism@@@ (14 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Graves_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D006111 @@@Graves' disease@@@, and 67 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Goiter_Nodular @DISEASE_MESH:D006044 @@@toxic nodular goiter@@@), and 82 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with simple @<m>DISEASE_Goiter</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006042 @@@goiter@@@.

citations.NLM: Gasińska T, Drózdz M, Izbicka M, Szydło E. [Effect of various beta-adrenolytic drugs and calcium channel blocker (nifedipine) on selected indicators of calcium-phosphorus metabolism in patients with hyperthyroidism and simple goiter]. Endokrynol Pol. 1988;39(6):327-37. PMID: 2908327
